title: Fact check: No evidence Pfizer, Moderna COVID-19 vaccines cause miscarriage
author: USA Today
description: One cannot determine causality with VAERS Dr. Sean O'Leary, Just because something is reported after vaccination absolutely does not mean vaccine was cause
sitename: University of Colorado Anschutz Medical Campus
